Command.CommandText: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM OverseaInvoiceReceiptManagement.dbo.AccountCheckImportData WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CompanyCode=@CompanyCode
SELECT top 1 PayedDate FROM dbo.AccountCheckImportData WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CompanyCode=@CompanyCode ORDER BY PayedDate DESC
SELECT SoSysNo,SerialNumber FROM dbo.AccountCheckImportData WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PayedDate=@PayedDate AND CompanyCode=@CompanyCode
select top 1 importData from dbo.AccountCheckDataContent WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CompanyCode=@CompanyCode

SELECT top 1 somaster.PayTypeSysNo AS PayTermsNo ,paytype.PayTypeName AS PayTerms FROM OverseaOrderManagement.dbo.V_OM_SO_Master somaster WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN OverseaControlPanel.dbo.V_CP_PayType paytype WITH(NOLOCK) ON somaster.PayTypeSysNo = paytype.SysNo WHERE somaster.SysNo=@SysNo AND somaster.CompanyCode=@CompanyCode

UPDATE TOP (200) soIncome SET PayedDate = import.PayedDate FROM IPP3.dbo.Finance_SOIncome soIncome INNER JOIN OverseaInvoiceReceiptManagement.dbo.AccountCheckImportData import WITH(NOLOCK) ON import.SoSysNo=soIncome.OrderSysNo WHERE soIncome.OrderType=1 and soIncome.PayedDate IS NULL AND import.PayedDate IS NOT NULL

UPDATE TOP (200) soIncome SET PayedDate = import.PayedDate FROM IPP3.dbo.Finance_SOIncome soIncome INNER JOIN OverseaInvoiceReceiptManagement.dbo.AccountCheckImportData import WITH(NOLOCK) ON import.SoSysNo=soIncome.MasterSoSysNo WHERE soIncome.OrderType=1 and soIncome.PayedDate IS NULL AND import.PayedDate IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT soIncome.SysNo FROM IPP3.dbo.Finance_SOIncome soIncome WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN OverseaInvoiceReceiptManagement.dbo.AccountCheckImportData import WITH(NOLOCK) ON import.SoSysNo=soIncome.OrderSysNo AND soIncome.OrderType=1 WHERE soIncome.PayedDate IS NULL AND import.PayedDate IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT soIncome.SysNo FROM IPP3.dbo.Finance_SOIncome soIncome WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN OverseaInvoiceReceiptManagement.dbo.AccountCheckImportData import WITH(NOLOCK) ON import.SoSysNo=soIncome.MasterSoSysNo AND soIncome.OrderType=1 WHERE soIncome.PayedDate IS NULL AND import.PayedDate IS NOT NULL ) AS a
